channel.title: Flash Game
channel.description:
Flash platform game made by me in Macromedia Flash 8 Professional.
What do you think about it? Any suggestions?

item.title: Flash Game
item.dc:creator: @mironic mironic
item.description:
@mironic wrote:

[quote=“Liquid Magic, post:2, topic:384060”][quote author=`Alec link=topic=479818.msg3512950#msg3512950 date=1298738479]
Any description other than that it is a platform game?

And try to stay away from flash…
[/quote]What’s wrong with it? It’s a useful tool constantly being used world-wide on the web.[/quote]
omg… he means to give a story or a description of what the game is/ or about… not just what he used to make it and that you jump and its 2d… we need moar infoz

Read full topic
